comprehensive_overview: GeneMark-ES (Eukaryotic) is a eukaryotic gene prediction software that accurately predicts the location and structure of protein-coding genes in eukaryotic genomes. It is based on an unsupervised ab initio approach using hidden Markov model algorithms.
core_features: Accurate prediction of protein-coding genes in eukaryotic genomes
Unsupervised ab initio gene prediction approach
